statements: SELECT * FROM fermentation_data WHERE batch_id = 1;
SELECT temperature FROM fermentation_data WHERE pH > 4.0;
SELECT batch_id, temperature, duration FROM fermentation_data WHERE pressure < 20.0;
SELECT * FROM fermentation_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT batch_id, pH FROM fermentation_data WHERE duration >= 60 AND duration <= 120;
SELECT * FROM fermentation_data ORDER BY batch_id DESC
SELECT batch_id, temperature, pH FROM fermentation_data WHERE pressure > 1.5 ORDER BY pH ASC, temperature DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) as avg_temp, MAX(pH) as max_pH FROM fermentation_data
SELECT batch_id, duration FROM fermentation_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30
SELECT * FROM fermentation_data WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY duration DESC
SELECT id, temperature, pH, time, status FROM FermentationData;
SELECT * FROM FermentationData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT id, yield, efficiency, date FROM YieldData ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT temperature, pH FROM FermentationData WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM YieldData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM FermentationData ORDER BY time DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, temperature, pH FROM FermentationData WHERE temperature > 25 AND pH < 6 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, yield, efficiency FROM YieldData WHERE efficiency > 85 AND yield > 100 ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT * FROM FermentationData WHERE status='Complete' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY time ASC;
SELECT id, batch_id, date FROM YieldData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC, batch_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, temperature, pH, time, pressure FROM fermentation_process_data;
SELECT * FROM yeast_strains WHERE optimal_temperature > 25;
SELECT strain_name, optimal_temperature, optimal_pH FROM yeast_strains ORDER BY optimal_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM fermentation_chambers WHERE temperature_controlled = TRUE;
SELECT chamber_name, temperature_controlled FROM fermentation_chambers WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY chamber_name;
SELECT id, temperature, pH FROM fermentation_process_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT strain_name, optimal_temperature FROM yeast_strains WHERE optimal_pH > 5 ORDER BY optimal_temperature DESC;
SELECT chamber_name, capacity FROM fermentation_chambers WHERE temperature_controlled = TRUE;
SELECT id, temperature, time FROM fermentation_process_data WHERE temperature < 25 AND pH > 5 ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT SUM(temperature) AS total_temperature, AVG(pH) AS avg_pH FROM fermentation_process_data;
SELECT * FROM fermentation_data;
SELECT start_time, temperature FROM fermentation_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT name, origin FROM yeast_strain ORDER BY origin DESC;
SELECT vessel_id, capacity, material FROM fermentation_vessel WHERE capacity >= 100 AND material = 'Stainless Steel';
SELECT description FROM process_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM fermentation_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT start_time, end_time, temperature FROM fermentation_data WHERE pH < 5 ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT vessel_id, capacity, material, status FROM fermentation_vessel WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT strain_id, name, origin, supplier FROM yeast_strain WHERE origin = 'USA' AND supplier = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, description, user_id FROM process_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM FermentationProcess;
SELECT fermentation_id, start_time, temperature FROM FermentationProcess WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT strain_name, supplier FROM YeastStrains ORDER BY supplier DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM FermentationLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM EquipmentInventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FermentationProcess WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT F.start_time, F.end_time, Y.strain_name FROM FermentationProcess F JOIN YeastStrains Y ON F.fermentation_id = Y.fermentation_id WHERE Y.supplier = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY F.start_time;

SELECT F.*, L.timestamp, L.log_message FROM FermentationProcess F INNER JOIN FermentationLogs L ON F.fermentation_id = L.fermentation_id WHERE F.temperature < 30 AND L.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY F.start_time ASC;
SELECT E.equipment_name, E.quantity, FO.optimization_description FROM EquipmentInventory E LEFT JOIN ProcessOptimization FO ON E.equipment_id = FO.fermentation_id ORDER BY E.quantity DESC;

SELECT F.*, Y.strain_name, L.log_message FROM FermentationProcess F JOIN YeastStrains Y ON F.fermentation_id = Y.fermentation_id LEFT JOIN FermentationLogs L ON F.fermentation_id = L.fermentation_id WHERE F.ph_level < 6 ORDER BY F.end_time DESC;
